resources.string: enable Accessibility Settings to use this App

This App uses Accessibility permission to Perform Following Actions

 Actions :
 1. Open Power Menu
 2. Turn Off the Screen
 3. Volume Buttons for Screen Locking

fill the checkbox below to accept the Accessibility Permission from Settings
if you are facing any issue then write us on telegram group and if you really found this app helpful for you then please rate this app on play store and also provide feedback
this app uses accessibility permission to turn off phone screen and show power menu
